mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ALERT( ALERT_TYPE, BOARD_TYPE, ALERT_OBJECT_ID, CONTENT, SENDER_ID, RECEIVER_ID, ALERT_DT, READ_YN )VALUES( #{alertType}, #{boardType}, #{alertObjectId}, #{content}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, SYSDATE(), 'N' )
mapper.select:
SELECT TA.ALERT_ID, TA.ALERT_TYPE, TA.ALERT_OBJECT_ID, TA.CONTENT, TUI.USER_NAME, TA.RECEIVER_ID, TA.ALERT_DT, TA.READ_YN FROM T_ALERT TA LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO TUI ON TUI.USER_ID = TA.SENDER_ID WHERE TA.RECEIVER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TA.ALERT_DT DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_ALERT TA LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO TUI ON TUI.USER_ID = TA.SENDER_ID WHERE TA.RECEIVER_ID = #{userId} AND TA.READ_YN = 'N'
